name: Sauteed Corn With Fava Beans
keywords: corn, fava beans, side dish, summer, vegetarian
recipeIngredient: Coarse sea salt and freshly ground pepper to taste

recipeInstructions.text: Blanch the fava beans for a minute in boiling water. Drain and rinse in cold water. Slip off the skins.

Melt the butter in a large frying pan. Add the corn and the fava beans. Cook over moderate heat, stirring, for three to four minutes. Season with salt and a liberal amount of pepper. Serve immediately.
